title: BRIEF-Pedro Resources Announces Transaction With Cellcube Energy Storage Systems Inc
text:
BRIEF-Pedro Resources Announces Transaction With Cellcube Energy Storage Systems Inc

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 03, 2019 03:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pedro Resources Announces Transaction With Cellcube Energy Storage Systems Inc Oct 3 (Reuters) - Pedro Resources Ltd PEDh.V : * PEDRO RESOURCES ANNOUNCES TRANSACTION WITH CELLCUBE ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS INC. * CONSIDERATION FOR THE ASSETS CONSISTS OF PAYMENT OF $1.75 MILLION OF CASH AND SECURITIES YET TO BE DETERMINED TO ACQUIRE THE ASSETS * MAJORITY OF FUNDS TO PAY FOR PURCHASE WILL COME FROM A FINANCING * PEDRO RESOURCES- ENTERED INTO NON-BINDING TERM SHEET PURSUANT TO WHICH CO INTENDS TO PURCHASE ALL ASSETS OF UNITS OF CELLCUBE, ENERCUBE AND POWERHAZ

BRIEF-Pedro Resources Announces Transaction With Cellcube Energy Storage Systems Inc
description: BRIEF-Pedro Resources Announces Transaction With Cellcube Energy Storage Systems Inc
